doc.previous: Since they are heat engines these devices are also limited by Carnot s theorem The limiting value of the Carnot efficiency for these processes with the equality theoretically achievable only with an ideal reversible cycle is
doc.after: The same device used between the same temperatures is more efficient when considered as a heat pump than when considered as a refrigerator
